title: What is the best music production software for windows? - Quora

response.answer_text: If you just want to record the song/music/voice, you can use pre-installed Voice recoreder present in Windows. But, if you want to record as wells as edit the audio. Then NCH softwares are the best for this purpose. The ‘NCH Wavepad' is the best software for audio editing for beginners. There are many tools provided inside these software, which will make your editing go smooth. If you require a professional editor, then you may go for following softwares as well:- Audacity.Adobe AuditionFL StudioAbleton LiveThanks!

If you never used any audio recording software before: use whatever came with your audio interface and microphone when you purchased those. It is free and will be a good starting point. If you are experienced in recording: use whatever you have been using so far. Learn how to take the most out of it. My point: use whatever you have available and learn everything there is to learn about that one. At some point you might want to try a different one, don’t. Only switch if you have a good reason such as a feature that doesn’t exist on your current one with no workarounds or price range and budget.
